name: Stay Cautious! BETA ver 0.1
description:
Welcome to a Mario-like platformer game made on scratch for the Wow Games Scratch Game Jam 3!

Upon pressing start, you're welcomed within a very dark, abandoned structure, full of leftover workers who have set traps and are patrolling the areas to hunt down and kill you! Someone came before you has set respawn points that cannot be destroyed, and has been able to give you 5 chances before finally dying. Can you escape this large structure? Or will you get trapped within?

CONTROLS: Arrow Keys to move; SPACE to dash; Jump on, or dash into enemies to squish them; watch out for spikes and saws!\

MUSIC: Bee Swarm Simulator - Stick Bug Song(slowed down) ROBLOX
